com.eco.bio7.environment

Class Environment

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.eco.bio7.environment.Environment

  • public class Environment
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides some static methods for the creation of custom formulas and disturbance functions inside the Bio7 application.
    Author:
    Bio7

      Environment() 

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clumbedDisturbance(int yd, int xd)
      A simple clumbed disturbance function.
      static void randomDisturbance(int x, int y, int value, int state)
      A random disturbance function which affects all states but not the defined state (per mille - slider value 1 = 0.1%).

    • Method Detail

      • clumbedDisturbance

        public void clumbedDisturbance(int yd,
                      int xd)
        A simple clumbed disturbance function.
        Parameters:
        xd - the extension in x direction.
        yd - the extension in y direction.

      • randomDisturbance

        public static void randomDisturbance(int x,
                     int y,
                     int value,
                     int state)
        A random disturbance function which affects all states but not the defined state (per mille - slider value 1 = 0.1%).
        Parameters:
        x - x-position
        y - y-position
        value - an integer value representing the disturbance
        state - a state not affected by the disturbance function
